p: Oxidation and inflammation are important factors connected with occurrence of various chronic diseases, such as diabetes mellitus type 2 ( Pouvreau et al., 2018). Due to the antioxidant, antiobesity and antidiabetic effects of N. sativa seeds and their constituents, this plant species can offer potential in prevention and treatment of type 2 diabetes. A recent review suggests that N. sativa can improve glycemic stages and lipid profile in diabetes ( Heshmati and Namazi, 2015).
